messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Grand pubah De Doink demands ya'll stop asking for all access

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Special message to bluezinho: JOKES ON YOU, CAPTAIN'S ALREADY A LESBIAN!(Ladies on board, flirting might get you somewhere, who knows.)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: We have our goal from command. We're going to construct a BSA-52 Artillery position. Got a problem with it, then head straight to the airlock. Godspeed, my good dudes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Attention crew: All mobs currently patrolling for a murderer may continue, as we will be using his body to power the station. Also, there will be a party commencing in the bar soon, standby for announcement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
